Name: PHP 8.1.0-dev Zerodium Backdoor vulnerabilities
Description: PHP 8.1.0-dev is a development version of PHP. The PHP 8.1.0-dev version was implanted with a backdoor on March 28, 2021, but the backdoor was quickly discovered and removed. When the backdoor exists on the server, the attacker can execute arbitrary code by sending the User-Agentt header.
Author: go0p
Impact: PHP 8.1.0-dev is a development version of PHP. The PHP 8.1.0-dev version was implanted in the backdoor on March 28, 2021, which may cause attackers to execute arbitrary code on the server side and control the entire web server.
